title: os.Args is not defined on http://golang.org/pkg/os
body:
by **Matthew.R.Schwartz**: 
os.Args is not defined on http://golang.org/pkg/os

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. go to http://golang.org/pkg/os/#Variables
2. verify that you can find reference to os.Args 
3. however it is defined http://golang.org/src/pkg/os/proc.go

What is the expected output? What do you see instead?
os.Args should be define in the variable section of http://golang.org/pkg/os

What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?
N/A

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
N/A
